title: Customer Satisfaction
goal: Our highest priority is to satisfy the customer through early and continuous delivery of valuable software.

title: Welcome Changing Requirements
goal: Welcome changing requirements, even late in development. Agile processes harness change for the customer’s competitive advantage.

title: Frequent Delivery
goal: Deliver working software frequently, from a couple of weeks to a couple of months, with a preference to the shorter timescale.

title: Collaboration
goal: Business people and developers must work together daily throughout the project.

title: Motivated Individuals
goal: Build projects around motivated individuals. Give them the environment and support they need, and trust them to get the job done.

title: Face-to-Face Communication
goal: The most efficient and effective method of conveying information to and within a development team is face-to-face conversation.

title: Working Software
goal: Working software is the primary measure of progress.

title: Sustainable Development
goal: Agile processes promote sustainable development. The sponsors, developers, and users should be able to maintain a constant pace indefinitely.

title: Technical Excellence
goal: Continuous attention to technical excellence and good design enhances agility.

title: Simplicity
goal: Simplicity—the art of maximizing the amount of work not done—is essential.

title: Self-Organizing Teams
goal: The best architectures, requirements, and designs emerge from self-organizing teams.

title: Reflection and Adjustment
goal: At regular intervals, the team reflects on how to become more effective, then tunes and adjusts its behavior accordingly.

title: Continuous Improvement
goal: Teams should continuously refine and improve their processes for delivering high-quality software.

title: Embrace Uncertainty
goal: Embrace uncertainty and manage it with continuous learning and experimentation.

title: Deliver Value
goal: Deliver value to customers frequently, improving their experience and satisfaction.

title: Focus on Outcomes
goal: Focus on outcomes rather than outputs to ensure that the product meets customer needs.

title: Respect and Trust
goal: Create an environment of respect and trust to foster a collaborative and innovative team culture.
